message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business.  While I'm not at liberty to disclose the specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000. This is a significant discount, and I believe it's an offer you won't want to miss. Please let me know your decision by [date].
